nodes.text: List of theme park attractions
The following list is of all  theme park attractions.
Jedi Training Academy

Jedi Training Academy is a guest experience at Disneyland and at Disney Hollywood Studios. The experience was first introduced at Disney Hollywood Studios during the Star Wars Weekends event, and later became a permanent attraction. The experience depends heavily on audience participation, focusing on children. Each participant is given a training lightsaber and Jedi robes and taught a routine set of swordfighting moves.
During the Season of the Force in November of 2015, an updated version of the show started, Jedi Training - Trials of the Temple, which drew inspiration from Star Wars Rebels.
Season of the Force

Season of the Force is an event that took place in multiple Disney theme parks, starting at Disneyland and Disney's Hollywood Studios in the Fall of 2015 ahead of the release of Star Wars: The Force Awakens. It included many additions to the parks like Disneyland's Hyperspace Mountain, the Star Wars Launch Bay exhibit, the Path of the Jedi movie montage, and Jedi Training: Trials of the Temple.
Hyperspace Mountain

Hyperspace Mountain is a Star Wars-themed seasonal overlay to the Space Mountain roller coaster attractions at three Disney Parks. The Disneyland version opened as part of the Season of the Force event on November 14th, 2015, and the Hong Kong Disneyland version opened June 11th, 2016, as part of the Star Wars: Tomorrowland Takeover event and finally on May 7th, 2017,it opened in Disneyland Paris.
On June 1, 2017, the Disneyland version of the ride returned to its original "classic" Space Mountain format, then the overlay was brought back on May 4th ("Star Wars Day") 2018 and 2019.
Star Tours

Star Tours was a Disney simulator ride theme park attraction located at Disneyland, Disney's Hollywood Studios, Tokyo Disneyland and Disneyland Park. It was the park's first attraction that did not use Disney-designed imagery. The original Star Tours closed in 2010 while Disney engineers built the updated and renovated ride, Star Tours: The Adventures Continue.
Two arcade games named Starcourse and Photomorph were located at the exit of the ride in Disneyland Paris, open from 1993 to 2005.
Star Tours: The Adventures Continue

Star Tours: The Adventures Continue is a simulator ride theme park attraction located at located at Disneyland, Disney's Hollywood Studios, Tokyo Disneyland and Disneyland Park. It officially opened at Florida on May 20th, 2011, at California on June 3rd, 2011, at Tokyo on May 7th, 2013 and at Paris on March 18, 2017.

The attraction replaced the original Star Tours attraction and serves as its prequel, taking place in between Episodes III and IV and tying both trilogies together. Additional elements from Episode VII were added in late 2015 to promote the new film.
Star Wars Launch Bay

Star Wars Launch Bay is an attraction found at various Disney theme parks featuring exhibits, memorabilia, and movie props based on the Star Wars films. Guests can also have photos taken with costumed characters and purchase various merchandise. It opened in 2015 at Disneyland on November 16 and Disney's Hollywood Studios on December 4, then in Shanghai Disneyland on June 16, 2016.
Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge
Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge is a themed land currently in development by The Walt Disney Company and it's slated to open in 2019 at Disneyland and Disney's Hollywood Studios.
Star Wars: Rise of the Resistance
Is an upcoming ride that will be part of the park. The attraction will put guests into the middle of a battle between the First Order and the Resistance.
Millennium Falcon: Smuggler's Run
An upcoming ride that will put guests in the cockpit of the Millennium Falcon.
